Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht gave the Lakers the lead in the third quarter, sparking the team's momentum heading into the final period.
Post-Match Reflections: The Lakers dominated the final period and the defense was just phenomenal. They were up by 20 points with two minutes left, so JJ Redick emptied the bench.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dalton Knecht hit a 3-point shot around the two-minute mark to give the LA Lakers a 79-77 lead.
